participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Family-oriented and caring, enjoys spending time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. i am terrified of scorpions. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey.

content.text: no I do not. my wife is the best. do you like ice cream?
I like chocolate. what do you do for a living? I love to park
